title: Epicor webinar: Industry experts traverse Cloud ERP tailored for the automotive sector
description: Vishal Raj Saini, Country Head of Epicor Software India and Indian Subcontinent, discussed 'Implementing Cloud ERP' with industry experts at a panel by The Economic Times and Epicor.
